name: A Simple Platformer
description:
This is a game that I created for a tutorial series  on  making a game in  Unity.    The player can run around and collect cherries while avoiding enemies.  

The player can kill the enemies by jumping on their heads or by spitting cherry seeds at them, but watch out once you're out of cherries then it's game over it an enemy attacks.   If you have cherries when you get attack, then you lose all of your cherries.

This game features music swapping at each level,        Audio panning dependent on where the enemy is, a fully functioning Save System using playerprefs, multiple enemy AI including a boss battle,   Scene transitions, and more.  

The music and SFX are things that I created a while ago.  It was not made for this game.  It's really just there to be a place holder. 

Artwork: Sunny Land  and  Sunny Land Forest Assets
Music & SFX: Me

Programming: Me

Controls are:

wasd or arrow keys
Space to jump

Left crtl to shoot

Left Alt to dash
